Start: ^I try distract myself from what just happened, but I can't keep myself from replaying the event in my mind.

First: ^I close my eyes and I can still see his panicked expression.
^I can feel his grip tight on my arm.
^I can hear his short, heaving breaths.

b: ^Was there nothing I could have done?
^Was there nothing I could have done?
^Was there nothing I could have done?

First: ^I've heard about panick attacks, but this is the first one I've actually witnessed.
^It really came out of nowhere... Did I miss something that caused this?
^More importantly, is Timothy going to be okay?
Repeated: ^There has to be something I can do to help!
^I feel so powerless... but I can't give up!
